title: [$250] Expose some basic data in the JS console when not running in production

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
# Problem When trying to debug issues, reporting the IDs of the relevant objects (policy, report, transaction, etc) is key, so we can inspect the DB, gather logs, etc That data is not currently easily accessible, so it's hard for internal employees as well as contributors to report issues with all the necessary data so that we can investigate them. # Solution When NOT in production (see `isProductionLib` and a similar use case [here](https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/9970ee0d37b149233a8c53c6d8ab031a282d672e/src/setup/addUtilsToWindow.ts#L15)), we want to expose to the JS console certain variables: - When in the workspace editor: the `policy` object in the variable `policy` - When in a report: the `report` object in the variable `report`, the `policy` it belongs to in the `policy` variable - When in a one expense report or in the transaction view: the `transaction` object in the variable `transaction`, the `receipt` object in the `receipt` variable (only if transaction has a receipt), the `report` object in the `report` variable and the policy it belongs to in the `policy` variable

  • Last Price Increase: 2025-11-17

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** V9.2.59-2 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** Yes **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/test-runs/TR-1995/folder/13176670/41237102/1016710066 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** Slottwo1 l@gmail.com **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** Redminote 10s android 13 **App Component:** Workspace Settings ## Action Performed: 1. Launch app 2. Go to workspace settings 3. Enable invoice feature 4. Disable all workflow features 5. Send an invoice 6. Long press invoice created 7. Note Delete option is not shown 8. Open the invoice - More - Delete 9. Note deleting invoice shows unexpected error ## Expected Result: When workflows are disabled, deleting invoice must not show unexpected error. Delete option must be shown on long pressing invoice in preview in context menu. ## Actual Result: When workflows are disabled, deleting invoice shows unexpected error. Delete option is not shown on long pressing invoice in preview in context menu. ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [x] Android: App - [x] Android: mWeb Chrome - [ ] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f35dbdf0-712d-43ad-b6af-264d17af9518 [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)

Navigate to staging.new.expensify.com 2. Go to Workspace chat -> Create a distance expense (call ExpenseWS) 3. Go to Self DM -> Create a distance expense (call ExpenseDM) 4. Open distance expense in self DM 5. Go offline 6. Tap More button >> Merge option >> select the displayed distance expense >> tap Continue 7. Select the merchant details of workspace distance expense (ExpenseWS) 8. Tap on Merge expenses 9. Observe skeleton loading displayed 10. Select the workspace distance expense in LHN 11. Observe empty report displayed ## Expected Result: No skeleton loader displayed when merging self DM distance expense with WS distance expense in offline mode & also expense preview should be displayed workspace chat instead of empty report ## Actual Result: 1. Skeleton loader when merging self DM distance expense with WS distance expense in offline mode 2. Empty report displayed in workspace chat ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: Select the officially supported platforms where the issue was reproduced: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [x] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [ ] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop

title: [$125] Migrate icons expensify branding - sign in icons - empty states & special to lazy loading

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
### Background We're migrating all icons and illustrations to use lazy loading to improve app startup performance by reducing the main bundle size. This is part of a larger initiative tracked in #74599. ### What needs to be done Migrate the following icons and illustrations to use the lazy loading system: **Icons/Illustrations to migrate:** **Expensify Branding:** - `ExpensifyAppIcon` - `ExpensifyCard` - `ExpensifyFooterLogo` - `ExpensifyFooterLogoVertical` - `ExpensifyLogoNew` - `ExpensifyWordmark` **Sign In Icons:** - `AppleLogo` - `GoogleLogo` **Empty States & Special:** - `EmptyStateRoutePending` - `EmptyStateSpyPigeon` - `MessageInABottle` - `ReceiptBody` - `SmartScan` - `TreasureChest` - `Exit` ### Migration Guide Please follow the comprehensive migration guide here: https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/main/contributingGuides/LAZY_ICONS_AND_ILLUSTRATIONS.md

title: [$250] Add BA - If company type selected offline, it is not shown correctly on confirmation page

labels.name: External
labels.description: Added to denote the issue can be worked on by a contributor

labels.name: Daily
labels.description: KSv2

labels.name: Help Wanted
labels.description: Apply this label when an issue is open to proposals by contributors

labels.name: Bug
labels.description: Something is broken. Auto assigns a BugZero manager.

body:
If you haven’t already, check out our [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/Expensify/ReactNativeChat/blob/main/contributingGuides/CONTRIBUTING.md) for onboarding and email contributors@expensify.com to request to join our Slack channel! ___ **Version Number:** 9.2.59-0 **Reproducible in staging?:** Yes **Reproducible in production?:** No **If this was caught during regression testing, add the test name, ID and link from BrowserStack:** https://test-management.browserstack.com/projects/2219752/folder/13176691/test-cases/41236745 **Email or phone of affected tester (no customers):** N/A **Issue reported by:** Applause Internal Team **Device used:** MacBook Air 15.6.1 Chrome, iPhone 15 iOS 26.0.1 **App Component:** Other ## Action Performed: 1. Sign in to ND 2. Create a workspace, open Workflows page, click Add bank account 3. Select "Log into your bank", proceed with adding Regions 1111 bank account 4. Complete Personal information step with valid data 5. On the RHP "What type of company is it?" go offline 6. Click the company type row and select "LLC" 7. Go online and click Next 8. Complete other steps until you are on the Company info confirmation page 9. Observe the "Company type" row ## Expected Result: Selected company type is shown correctly on confirmation page ## Actual Result: Company type shows "businessInfoStep.incorporationType." ## Workaround: Unknown ## Platforms: - [ ] Android: App - [ ] Android: mWeb Chrome - [x] iOS: App - [ ] iOS: mWeb Safari - [ ] iOS: mWeb Chrome - [x] Windows: Chrome - [x] MacOS: Chrome / Safari - [ ] MacOS: Desktop ## Screenshots/Videos https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ee9f41ec-5415-4c4d-933d-ec0db7db3dde [View all open jobs on GitHub](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22Help+Wanted%22)
